name: aipowered-helpdesk
description: AI powered help desk using Express and n8n

scripts.test: env -u http_proxy -u https_proxy -u HTTP_PROXY -u HTTPS_PROXY -u npm_config_http_proxy -u npm_config_https_proxy -u npm_config_proxy -u YARN_HTTP_PROXY -u YARN_HTTPS_PROXY sh -c 'node tests/app.test.js && node tests/assetHistory.test.js && node tests/assetNameHistory.test.js && node tests/dueSoon.test.js && node tests/assetDepreciate.test.js && node tests/assetMaintenance.test.js && node tests/maintenanceCost.test.js && node tests/depreciatedAssets.test.js && node tests/assetSearch.test.js && node tests/assetAssignedFilter.test.js && node tests/assetRetire.test.js && node tests/ticketAssigneeFilter.test.js && node tests/ticketSubmitterFilter.test.js && node tests/assetTags.test.js && node tests/mttr.test.js && node tests/workload.test.js && node tests/reassignLeastBusy.test.js && node tests/health.test.js && node tests/dueDateHistory.test.js && node tests/qdrantVector.test.js && node tests/attachmentDelete.test.js && node tests/assetTagStats.test.js && node tests/ticketDelete.test.js && node tests/assetDelete.test.js && node tests/userStats.test.js && node tests/priorityStats.test.js && node tests/commentDelete.test.js && node tests/commentEdit.test.js && node tests/unassignedAssets.test.js && node tests/unassignedTickets.test.js && node tests/ticketSort.test.js && node tests/assetSort.test.js && node tests/ticketClose.test.js && node tests/ticketReopen.test.js && node tests/ticketEscalate.test.js && node tests/maintenanceStats.test.js && node tests/recentTickets.test.js && node tests/cors.test.js && node tests/assetLastMaintenance.test.js'
